description:
Travelling by bike doesn’t mean travelling light. Grab this frame bag when you need that little extra room for your essentials, especially if it involves some post bonk snacks.

  • Durable material with a waterproof zipper to keep your gear dry
  • 4 velcro tabs to secure it to your bike for any terrain
  • Top gear loops add extra versatility
  • Reflective details help you stand out in the dark
name: Deuter Cabezon Frame Bag 6
